QuestData.Title: WANTED: Custos
QuestData.Description:
A once-stable automa is showing signs of unusual dysfunction, attacking Enlightened along the road outside of Pilgrim's Grace.
It is essential that the roads remain safe for our pilgrims.
Rafiq has designated the elimination of this threat to be of the highest priority.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Custos has lost control and is attacking anything in its vicinity.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Inform Rafiq in Pilgrim's Grace of your success.
QuestData.RewardText: I do not understand why it was behaving in that manner, but we will be safer now that it is gone. This reward shall start you on the way towards some of my finer equipment.
